html:
9.23.20  11:28 am   You said the song you are currently working on is the longest youve written.

      Was it randomly chosen, or do you have a reason for doing it now?
9.23.20  11:08 am   How do I make bad videos?

9.23.20  10:59 am   A wise man once said that it's not quite useful to be super retrospective. But some other wise man also said that past is the preface of future. You don't seem to be a retrospective man either because you don't look back at your past work and think "oh i wish i did this better/differently". So, i'm confused now. Should i be retrospective or not?
9.23.20  10:59 am   how many time changes are in your next song?

9.23.20  10:54 am   https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=202009221531

"I could tell you what I think" ok then what do you think?

     when do you *think* it will be done?
9.23.20  10:48 am   9.22.20  2:36 pm i really really really DON'T want that
9.23.20  10:38 am   how do you cope with stress? totally asking for a friend
9.23.20  10:31 am   WRONG ANSWERS ONLY: When will your next video be uploaded?

9.23.20  9:51 am   when you have odd time signature songs, do you intentionally make them odd time or do you write melodies that Happen to be in odd time? as primarily a drummer i find if i come up with some cool odd time signature grooves on drums, then based on it i can think of odd time melodies more easily above it
9.23.20  9:28 am   Do you think it would be a good idea to learn German?

9.23.20  9:28 am   Will you ever break character?

     Or is this how you act in real life?
9.23.20  9:11 am   Will you ever make a video on the greatness of bread?

9.23.20  9:10 am   Are you currently working on a new project,

     and if yes, is it going well?
9.23.20  9:08 am   how to deal with crippling anxiety and get productive\
9.23.20  9:00 am   do you remember all your own music?
9.23.20  8:03 am   I want to play some bass but they said that i am too small for mall.so i can't go to the mall and buy a bass. What can i do?pleeese answer

9.23.20  6:58 am   Hi Bill, I want to make songs and also videos to go with them but I seem to lack the talent and motivation to do it. I feel completely lost, like I'm in limbo, floating in plasma and I don't know which way is up anymore. How do you find the strength to keep going? Or to even start in the first place?

9.23.20  6:28 am   Some people are saying that u are working on a new video is that true?
I love u
9.23.20  6:09 am   If you had an infinite amount of time, what would be the first and last thing you'd do?

9.23.20  5:56 am   How long til the new video timer reaches zero?
How long til the new video timer from tomorrow reaches zero?
9.23.20  5:43 am   should it be a law to not put pineapples on pizza?
9.23.20  5:35 am   do you ever think macs are overpriced?
9.23.20  5:28 am   will your newest song have some blazin' keyboard melodies?
9.23.20  5:20 am   Can you explain what the language of love is?
9.23.20  4:56 am   when is the next vid coming out
9.23.20  3:53 am   when will my life start
9.23.20  3:11 am   are all of your answers completely ad-lib or are some of these serious responses?
9.23.20  2:07 am   In the "unboxing video" video, whats inside the 3rd box that says "fragile"?
9.23.20  1:46 am   i found meaning in one of your songs. should i be worried?
9.23.20  1:26 am   is the name of your new video I can't tell you if you aren't feeling fearless
9.23.20  1:04 am   what song really takes you back to the good ol' days?
9.23.20  12:20 am   Why am I going insane?
9.22.20  11:22 pm   is spaghetti a sport or a language
9.22.20  10:47 pm   why are you awake so late
9.22.20  10:40 pm   Why did the chicken cross the road?
9.22.20  10:28 pm   how long does it take for you to make your videos?
9.22.20  10:19 pm   Is it true that your new song will feature the sound of a wet blanket hitting a live cat?
9.22.20  10:17 pm   any advice on life?
9.22.20  9:46 pm   cycles or eevee?
9.22.20  9:26 pm   When you set up your questions page did you expect do end up waxing phikosophical at some point or did it just happen with certain questions
9.22.20  9:10 pm   What is a human?
9.22.20  8:39 pm   How are you so amazing
9.22.20  7:48 pm   How do I get over the fear of creating the things I want to create?
9.22.20  6:28 pm   how many more songs before you crack?
9.22.20  6:10 pm   how much are you allowed to like yourself before it becomes narcissism? How much are you allowed to care for and protect yourself before it becomes selfish?
9.22.20  6:01 pm   Hey Bill! I have a podcast I want to make but I'm being lazy about recording the first episode. My perfectionist/overprepareness is killing me. What do?
9.22.20  5:25 pm   what editor do you use
9.22.20  5:00 pm   What's the best Wi-Fi name you've seen?
9.22.20  4:16 pm   what's a thing

9.22.20  4:14 pm   so this new song of yours will be the 3rd one that's over 4 minutes long (at least, according to the songs listed on your snogs page). How does it feel to make longer songs?

      Ideally how long would you want your songs to be?

     Of all the songs you've written so far (but not recorded/released), how long do you estimate your longest one is?

     and how many words does the next song contain?

     thank you!
